item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Aidan and I am a software engineer based in Ireland. I studied Computer Applications & Software Engineering at Dublin City University. I am passionate about all things tech, especially about anything that lives on the internet which includes web apps, mobile apps and everything in between! After graduating from university in 2020, I joined Fidelity Investments as a Software Engineering Associate which is where I still work today. Here, I work on a vast array of interesting and exciting projects on a daily basis.
